sae.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an envelope on which you have written your own name and address, and usually put a stamp, so that someone else can send you something
sae.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: For further details, send an sae to the following address.
sae.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: stamped addressed envelope; an envelope that you put your name, address, and a stamp on, so that someone can send you something
sae.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: self-addressed envelope; an envelope that you put your own name and address on
